text.__SUMMARY__: Tillandsia duratii is a species in the genus Tillandsia. This species is native to Bolivia.
text.Cultivars:
Tillandsia 'Burnt Fingers'
Tillandsia 'Lilac Spire'
Tillandsia 'Pacific Blue'
Tillandsia 'Wo'
